name: Lt. Morales
title: Combat Medic
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 172 Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second. Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target ally 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 198 to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

heroics.name: Stim Drone
heroics.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

heroics.name: Medivac Dropship
heroics.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

original.name: Lt. Morales
original.title: Combat Medic
original.description: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.
original.shortDescription: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Lt. Morales
baseHeroInfo.title: Combat Medic
baseHeroInfo.description: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor
trait.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 172 Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second. Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target ally 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 198 to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

heroicAbilities.name: Stim Drone
heroicAbilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Medivac Dropship
heroicAbilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

otherAbilities.name: Cellular Reactor
otherAbilities.description: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

otherAbilities.name: Detonate Displacement Grenade
otherAbilities.description: Detonate Displacement Grenade, dealing 198 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

otherAbilities.name: Reinforcements
otherAbilities.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship. Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds. Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor
trait.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship. skins.name: Combat Medic
skins.description: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.

skins.name: First Lt. Morales
skins.description: The UED outfits its best soldiers with the finest in experimental ordnance, and its medics are no exception. As such, Lt. Morales's gear has been upgraded in accordance with her service record.

skins.name: Love Doctor Morales
skins.description: Whether your heart is broken, bleeding, or located somewhere outside of your body, the Love Doctor will patch you right up.

skins.name: Apothecary Morales
skins.description: The Royal Apothecary Society's experiments have resulted in many alchemical discoveries, which Apothecary Morales administers to soldiers in the field. Some side effects may occur.
